price: Whether you speak loudly [or not], He surely knows what is secret and what is even more hidden.
arabic: وَإِن تَجۡهَرۡ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخۡفَى

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
